oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pension application letter describing injuries of Benjamin B. Ferguson Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Benjamin B. Ferguson of Elizabethton, Carter Co., Tenn. served in Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Union veterans and their spouses were elligible for pensions from the federal government based on their service, health, and financial situation. The letter from the Bureau of Pensions mentions the Walter Preston Brownlow. W. P. Brownlow represented upper East Tennessee in Congress. He secured an appropriation for the consturction of a Union veterans home in Johnson City, Tennessee.
